text: hello again everybody it's me Steven
from langmaster learning system in
today's video we will learn how to
answer questions that might be asked
during a job interview now it's
important to have the ability to
naturally introduce yourself talk about
your qualifications explain why you left
your last job state your relevant
experience as well as answer other basic
questions your interviewer might have
now listen carefully then practice these
answers as they pertain to you and your
next job interview will be much more
successful let's do it
can you please introduce yourself I'm a
hardworking person I'm a reliable person
I am professional I'm an outgoing person
I'm a helpful person I'm good at dealing
with people
I'm a dedicated worker I'm able to work
under great pressure and get the job
done I pay attention to details I
understand my customers needs I learn
quickly
well what kind of qualifications or
achievements do you have I graduated an
IT from the Hanoi University of Science
and Technology I'm getting a BA degree
in modern languages from Open University
I took one year accounting training
program at Houston Community College why
did you leave your last job I wanted to
focus and finding a job that would
challenge me I wanted to focus on
finding a job that's near to home I
wanted to focus on finding a job that
suits my strengths well what relevant
experience do you have I have been
working as a sales representative for 10
years I've been working in customer
service and have been dealing with
complaints for several years
why would you like to work for I would
like to put into practice what I learned
at university I'm interested in pursuing
a career in marketing and your company
is the best in the field when can you
start work I can start work immediately
I'll be available for work starting next
Monday I have to give one week's notice
to my current employer so I can start on
the 1st of March do you have any
questions about the position
who would I be working closely with who
would I report to what would be the
first project I'd be working on if I was
offered the job when will I get an
answer how soon can I start all right
that's it for today's video I really
hope you found it useful and you will
have a better time with your next job
interview and if you did find it useful
be sure to like share and subscribe to
our Channel and if you're looking for a
suitable English course be sure to leave
your phone number and your email address
in the comment box below again i'm
steven from langmaster learning system
and i'll see you in the next video
